name: elyxm-railway
description: Medusa 2.0 ecommerce platform with local development setup

scripts.db:shell: docker exec -it medusa-postgres-dev psql -U medusa_user -d medusa_dev
scripts.db:backup: docker exec medusa-postgres-dev pg_dump -U medusa_user medusa_dev > backup_$(date +%Y%m%d_%H%M%S).sql
scripts.db:migrate: cd backend && npm run db:migrate && cd ../storefront && npm run db:migrate && cd ../backend && npm run seed && cd ../
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../storefront && npm install
